评论详情: Perfect and pretty

I bought this to alter to make a pirate coat for the Renaissance Faire. I cut out the thin bottom layer and used it to make ruffles for the sleeves, added trim all around the edge and to the bottoms the sleeves, added toggle closures to the front, and added a corset style ribbon lacing panel to the back to make it more form fitting. It would be fine to use even as it comes, but it's a great base to create something more elaborate from!

评论概述: Not great. The black is better than the grey.
评论详情: Go up two sizes if you want to wear it over anything thicker than a teeshirt. A large just fits my shoulders and arms and I'm not a particularly big woman. Also, it's not very flattering on me. The black is a lot better than the grey. They just don't flow nicely.  A belt doesn't help nor does a clip holding the front together. I haven't washed them yet so maybe the material will look better after a wash as they are wrinkled from shipping. I'm not putting it in the dryer because I can't risk shrinking it. Notice the model has her hands in her pockets? That's the only way the grey one looks half way decent on me. I might just use this as a robe if it doesn't improve after a wash.
